generationCharge.description: Cost related to fuel and generation.

capacityCharge.description: Charge for ensuring system capacity and reliability.

networkCharge.description: Covers operation and maintenance of the electricity infrastructure.

retailCharge.description: Covers customer service and billing costs.
retailCharge.waiverCondition: Waived for domestic customers using 600 kWh or less per month.

automaticFuelAdjustment.description: Variable mechanism (formerly ICPT), adjusted periodically based on fuel costs. Currently RM0.00 for July 2025.

energyEfficiencyIncentive.condition: For domestic customers using 1,000 kWh or less per month.

timeOfUseTariff.availability: Optional opt-in scheme, expanded to all registered TNB domestic customers.
timeOfUseTariff.applicationProcess: Submit application form via email (tnbtou@tnb.com.my), Kedai Tenaga, or myTNB app. Requires a RM10 stamp duty fee on the supply contract.
timeOfUseTariff.switchBackFee: RM10 stamp duty fee for switching back to General Tariff (recommended after at least one billing cycle).

energyChargeToURates.description: Energy charges for Time of Use scheme with differentiated peak and off-peak rates.
